page.title: 10CLUBS IN ETTRICK VALLEY.
page.content: In the valley there are 5 clubs. There is the Womens Rural Institute, which has a meeting on a Tuesday night once a month.It runs from September to May.The Badminton club is on a Wednes- day night and there is a junior club which is held before the seniors. The Keep Fit club runs when the junior badminton is on so that the mums can come to the keep fit whilst their children are at badminton.There is a bowling club held every Thursday night in the Winter.The monthly Whist is for any body to join in if they can play. The Badminton and Bowlers sometimes run matches and tournaments to play other clubs in the Borders.The Bowlers also have open tournaments. At the end of the Badminton and Bowling season they both join up and have a dance at which they present the prizes.
